name: Dwarven Lead
description:
On board an altazimuth mount gun turret strapped on a giant eagle, you are on a mission to destroy the vicious core, corrupting the land of the Dwarves.

Survive the repeated assault of the gargoyles until you reach the top of the tower where the vicious core lies.

Programming: Mathieu Philippe ( https://twitter.com/MoArtis )
Art: Nils Fischer ( https://twitter.com/thuskyart )
Music: Cold Journey by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
